markdownRemark.html: The Wine Museum is, in every way a beautiful place that offers wine, food and history of wines accompanied by a wine tasting tour. Call for details on upcoming events. Museum open all year. There is also an outdoor patio if the weather is good where one can drink wine and eat. There is a good restaurant in this place with moderate prices. This is a must see in Mijas.

frontmatter.title: Mijas Wine Museum
frontmatter.description: Mijas Wine Museum - The Wine Museum is, in every way a beautiful place that offers wine, food and history of wines accompanied by a wine tasting tour. Call for details on upcoming events. Museum open all year. There is also an outdoor patio if the weather is good where one can drink wine and eat. There is a good restaurant in this place with moderate prices. This is a must see in Mijas.
